titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress relating to the elections in Albania scheduled for June 29, 1997, and the admission of a free and democratic Albania to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 6/23/1997--Introduced. Calls for: (1) the elections in Albania scheduled for June 29, 1997, to be free and open; (2) all political parties of Albania to honor the results of such elections; and (3) the administration to work with other members of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) as soon as possible to admit a free and democratic Albania to NATO.
